issue.title: [R] wire up exponentiation bindings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12144](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12144). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Once ARROW-11070 is merged, we can remove the R-based workarounds for these.
